build.beforeDevCommand: cd ../core && cargo build && mkdir -p ../client/src-tauri/binaries && TARGET=$(rustc -vV | grep host | cut -d' ' -f2) && cp ../../target/debug/etch-core ../client/src-tauri/binaries/etch-core-$TARGET && cd ../client && pnpm dev:web
build.beforeBuildCommand: cd ../core && cargo build --release --bin etch-core && bash bundle-as-app.sh && mkdir -p ../client/src-tauri/binaries && TARGET=$(rustc -vV | grep host | cut -d' ' -f2) && rm -rf ../client/src-tauri/binaries/etch-core-$TARGET.app && cp -R ../../target/release/etch-core.app ../client/src-tauri/binaries/etch-core-$TARGET.app && cp ../../target/release/etch-core.app/Contents/MacOS/etch-core-$TARGET ../client/src-tauri/binaries/etch-core-$TARGET && cd ../client && pnpm build:web
